name: FNaF:Freddy Pizzeria Clicker REMASTERED (LazyGuyGames)
description:
It's a combination of FNaF and Clicker game elements, manage the Freddy Fazbear pizzeria, get money and climb to the top.

This is a remastered version of the popular FNaF Freddy Pizzeria Clicker which is nicer and smoother.

Changes:

  • This game is smoother and less demanding
  • Is easier to understand
  • Annoying and unnecessary mechanics removed
  • New content
  • This game is better
